name: Final Meltdown
description:
Two kingdoms and two kings they must fight for their war to end. Which king will win? this two player game made for Global Game Jam 2022.

Credits
Beran Tekin 
Deren Tavşancı

PLAYER 1                      
W - Jump
A D - Movement
SPACE - Shoot

PLAYER 2
ARROW KEYS - Movement
Keypad Enter -Shoot
